fields.label: Page Title
fields.value: primo - develop and edit sites like never before

html:
• Pricing

Develop and edit sites
like never before

Creating a fully custom, easily editable site
shouldn’t be so complicated. Now, it isn't.

Use from your browser

Get to the code

Edit your site component-by-component (each with encapsulated styles) and use Tailwind out of the box alongside your favorite JS libraries with zero setup.

Edit with ease

Editing on the frontend isn't just for page-builders anymore. Write and edit text right on the page and add fields in seconds to easily edit structured content.

Create a component library

Create a new component, add it to your library, then place it anywhere on your site. And when you update it, every instance of it gets updated too.

Commit your data

Site data and images get committed to Github, so you can track code and content changes through history and keep your data in your own hands.

Deploy a static API

Access your page and site content from anywhere by deploying a static API that gets updated everytime you publish site updates. No setup, no fuss.

Build a static site

Everytime you publish your changes, primo builds a lightning-fast static site (i.e. just HTML & CSS) which you can deploy to your host of choice.

primo is in public beta as of August 2020
Community | Terms | Privacy
©
